description:
Take on challenging and cold terrain in comfort. The Quest Winter Boot's progressive design borrows elements from Salomon® trail running shoes and works them into rugged winter package. The waterproof-breathable membrane seals out moisture while the thick insulation and fleece lining keep your feet warm. Winter Contagrip® rubber ensures your feet stay in place on snow and ice.

  • Waterproof leather and textile upper for out-of-the-box comfort and durability
  • ClimaSalomon waterproof-breathable membrane construction with gusseted tongue keeps feet dry
  • Thinsulate™ insulation and a thick fleece lining keep feet warm
  • Protective rubber heel and toecaps for scuff resistence
  • Removable EVA insole adds comfort underfoot
  • Injected EVA advanced chassis midsole incorporates a moulded shank for a stable cushioned ride
  • Non-marking Winter Contagrip® rubber compound for traction and stability on slippery surfaces
name: Salomon Quest TS Waterproof Winter Boots - Men's
